Title: ASP.NET AJAX jQuery Extension
Description: ASP.NET AJAX jQuery Extension is components library based on ASP.NET AJAX Control Toolkit approach and jQuery javascript library  that simplifies HTML document traversing, event handling, animating, and Ajax interactions.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
ASP.NET AJAX jQuery Extension is components library based on ASP.NET AJAX Control Toolkit approach and jQuery javascript library that simplifies HTML document traversing, event handling, animating, and Ajax interactions.

jQuery.NET aims to build collection of functional ASP.NET ajax components easy-to-use on server-side and client-side ajax programming. Main feature of this projects is combine ASP.NET AJAX Control Toolkit approach and jQuery JavaScript library.

ASP.NET AJAX Control Toolkit suggest an elegant way how to create ASP.NET ajax component. Base classes for control and extender, attributes and designers is decision for server-side programming and Microsoft AJAX for client-side. But some disappointments relating to Microsoft AJAX pure functionality to traverse and control HTML document suggest idea of using jQuery javascript library on client-side.

jQueryNET supports all major web browsers including:
  • Internet Explorer 6+
  • Firefox 2+ (PC, Mac)
  • Safari 3+
  • Opera 9+ (PC, Mac)
  • Chrome
